   contain the root `toctree` directive.

biacpype Documentation
====================================

biacpype is a pipeline for converting data from `BIAC <https://www.biac.duke.edu/>`_ to the standard
BIDS format and performing anlysis.

Please checkout the user manual `here`_ for an overview of this pipeline!

.. _here: ../../manual/manual.pdf

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Modules

   biac2bids
